criteria.name: Correct prefix length
criteria.description: Correctly calculates the prefix length required to create 100 subnets.  Half point for minor errors in logic or computation. Zero points for no meaningful attempt or completely incorrect approach.

criteria.name: First and last address representation
criteria.description: Correctly identifies the first and last address of the first subnet. Half point for partially correct answers with minor errors. Zero points for no valid representation.

criteria.name: Address compression
criteria.description: Fully compressed IPv6 address following proper rules. Half point for partially compressed with minor errors.

criteria.name: Explanation of rules
criteria.description: Clearly explains steps and rules (e.g., zero compression, removal of leading zeros). Half point for vague or partially correct explanation.

criteria.name: IPv4 addressing scheme
criteria.description: Proposes an efficient, scalable IPv4 addressing plan. Half point for a partially optimized plan but missing key elements.

criteria.name: IPv6 addressing scheme
criteria.description: Proposes a detailed, efficient IPv6 addressing scheme. Half point for a partially optimized plan but lacking scalability or clarity.

criteria.name: Subnet mask and number of subnets
criteria.description: Correctly calculates subnet mask and number of subnets. Half point for minor calculation errors or a partially correct answer.

criteria.name: Network and broadcast addresses
criteria.description: Correctly identifies network and broadcast addresses for the first two subnets. Half point for partially correct answers but with minor errors.

criteria.name: Prefix length for customer networks
criteria.description: Correctly determines prefix length for efficient aggregation. Half point for partially correct answer with errors in calculation.

criteria.name: Efficient aggregation explanation
criteria.description: Provides a clear plan to minimize routing table size. Half point for a vague or partially correct explanation.

criteria.name: Explanation of differences
criteria.description: Detailed and accurate explanation of classful and classless addressing. Half point for a partial explanation with some inaccuracies.

criteria.name: Efficiency of classless addressing
criteria.description: Correctly identifies why classless addressing is more efficient. Half point for a partially correct explanation.

criteria.name: Correct calculations
criteria.description: 0.25 points each for: Network address, broadcast address, number of valid hosts, and first/last usable addresses.

criteria.name: Role of subnet mask
criteria.description: Clearly explains the purpose of the subnet mask. Half point for a partially correct explanation.

criteria.name: Subnet and host calculations
criteria.description: Correct calculations for subnets, hosts, and broadcast address. Half point for minor calculation errors.

criteria.name: Set 1 aggregation
criteria.description: Correct supernet for Set 1. Half point for minor errors in calculation.

criteria.name: Set 2 aggregation

criteria.name: Explanation of routing table function
criteria.description: Accurate and clear explanation. Half point for a partial or unclear explanation.

criteria.name: Key differences
criteria.description: Detailed and accurate comparison. Half point for a partially correct or vague explanation.

criteria.name: Examples
criteria.description: Provides valid examples of both protocol types. Half point for partially correct examples.
